title: Simulation-Based Workshop for Exploring University Students' Learning and Teaching Conceptions [Large-Scale]

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical analysis skills and experience using VR (Virtual Reality) devices
context.additional_context: Learners simulate university students' teaching-learning perceptions in a VR environment and experience analyzing survey data

learning_goals: Can identify three or more implicit learning conceptions of university students in virtual scenarios
Can classify teaching conception types by statistically analyzing survey results
Can propose educational design improvements based on data derived from VR-based simulations
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
